function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to inadequate sustainability measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Implementation of rigorous sustainability measures and health protocols.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technology, smart building management systems.","People":"Occupants, visitors, employees, general public.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."}]}
